fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Patrol a player's house during the night. Astral
- Oversee a conversation between two players during the day, learning all whispers between them. They will not be notified. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you patrol a player's house, you will give them Powerful Defense. Additionally, any non-attack visits on them will automatically fail.
- You will be notified the first time each day that a player whispers another; you will not be notified if there's a reply.
